title: Dalma Mall 100 Days of Wonders caign draws to a close with ecstatic winners happy shoppers
text: (MENAFN Press) (MENAFN - MENAFN Press) image2 DUBAI MEDIA CITY UAE - Sept. 29 2015 - PRLog -- Dalma Mall 100 Days of Wonders campaign draws to a close with ecstatic winners happy shoppersFatima Al Marzooqi wins Nissan Patrol Grand Prize in the third Mega RaffleAbu Dhabi September 2015: Dalma Mall one of the most preferred shopping retail and entertainment destinations in Abu Dhabi has announced that the 100 Days of Wonders campaign has come to a grand close after a successful period which saw a vast number of winners happy shoppers and a wide array of entertainment activities.The campaign ended with the 3rd Grand Raffle Draw on the 1st Day of Eid Al Adha where Fatima Al Marzooqi was adjudged the lucky winner of Nissan Patrol. The 100 Days of Wonders campaign which started on June 16 and ended on September 23 2015 combined the quintessence of Ramadan Eid Al Fitr summer Back to School and Eid Al Adha festivities.Fatima Al Marzooqi thus became the third lucky winner of the Grand Raffle prize as part of the 100 Days of Wonders campaign. Earlier El Amir Ahmed Abdel Kawi and Mohamed Abdelfattah Mohamed each won Nissan Patrols in the Grand Prize draws. Shoppers making purchases worth AED 200 at any outlet within Dalma Mall were entitled to enter the monthly raffles which also included prizes such as 3 Nissan Patrols shopping vouchers from Dalma Mall stores electronic gadgets and school accessories!Innumerable entertainment events were also held within the Mall as part of the 100 Days of Wonders festivities which included Fitness First Sports Competitions and Family Puppet Show Dalma iWall Competitions The Ronald McDonald show Freej Show and much more.Mr. Bhupinder Singh General Manager & CFO of Dalma Mall said: ''The 100 Days of Wonders campaign in Dalma Mall were 100 days of non-stop entertainment excitement and fast-paced activities. We are overwhelmed with the response to this campaign. The surging footfall and high number of winners across different nationalities are testimony enough of the success of this campaign. We look forward to continued excitement through other interesting initiatives at Dalma Mall in the weeks to come.''About Dalma MallDalma Mall is one of the largest shopping malls located in Abu Dhabi. The mall is prominently situated on the Abu DhabiTarifAl Ain highway opposite Mohammed Bin Zayed City and at the heart of Abu Dhabi''s growth corridor. A short distance from Maqta Bridge and Abu Dhabi International Airport Dalma Mall is one of Abu Dhabi''s shopping and tourist destination and features over 400 stores.Dalma Mall is part of the strategic plan of Abu Dhabi 2030 which sets out the framework of the Emirate''s long-term growth. Market Research has shown that the rapidly developing region surrounding Dalma Mall has evolved into a large multi-cultural middle class population and the mall has fulfilled the requirements of young Emirati families and affluent expats requiring close access to world-class retail and leisure facilities. The faith in Abu Dhabi''s 2030 Economic Vision had become the owners'' inspiration and motivation to move forward with a dream to succeed. Over the last few years Mussafah industrial area has improved and increased its residence month by month as well as many commercial companies re-locating to this up and coming area.Dalma Mall has realised its dream of becoming the city''s super regional mall. The mall is progressing and now hosts more than 100 plus events each year. Dalma Mall has become the place where customers can meet and greet or take part in interactive one-of-a-kind events. With a strong tenant mix as unique and exciting the mall eyes itself as a one-stop-shop a community inside a city.Dalma Mall is owned by The Developers LLC and has a total built-up area of 250000 square metres and a total gross leasable area of 150000 square meters. It is placed at the intersection of several of the most rapidly developing areas in the UAE. The mall which opened in 2010 features stores including Carrefour Fun City Ace Hardware Adventure HQ Home Centre Centrepoint and Marks & Spencer H&M and Debenhams and many more. --- End ---
